title: Curecanti National Recreation Area: Dry Gulch
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Camping     Dry Gulch                Dry Gulch Campground              Dry Gulch Campground is located 17 miles west of Gunnison just north of U.S. Highway 50. The campground is shaded by large cottonwood trees and can accommodate tents or medium sized RVs. All sites are first-come first-served.     Approximate Open Dates: May to mid-October   Sites: 9   Accessible Sites: no    Water:  yes, mid-May to mid-September    Flush Toilets:  no   Vault Toilets:  yes    Tables & Fire Grates: yes   Elevation:  7568 feet   Horse Corral:  yes              Horse Corral Dimensions »    Fees     All Sites $16.00 per night ($8.00 per night with Interagency Senior/Access Pass)
